title: These are to certifie you that the bearer hereof, by name Angelus Jacobi, a merchant of Cyprus, sayling out of Egypt unto Creet, fell most vnfortunately into the hands of Turkish pirats
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
notes: Date and place of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Includes cover letter signed and dated by Abp. of York, 11 April 1625, by bp. of Peterborough 28 October, 1625, and nine other bishops, undated.
"Giuen at Our Palace at Westminster the thirteenth of September."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
